instructions: Touch and hold the photo or video, then tap Quick Look. Tap the Action button , then tap Save Image.

Touch and hold the attachment, then tap Markup (if it s an attachment you re sending) or Markup and Reply (if it s an attachment you ve received). Use the drawing and annotation tools. See Use Markup in apps on iPhone .
Touch and hold the attachment until a menu appears. Tap the app you want to use to open the attachment.
Tap the Filter emails button to turn on filtering. Tap Filtered by, then turn on Only Mail with Attachments.
Open the Books app . Tap Search, then enter iPhone User Guide for iOS 12.3. Tap Get, then wait for the book to download.
